constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 213 (Thursday, December 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 6236.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States
[Page H7638]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: FAIRNESS in Flood Insurance Act of 2021
